mapper.insert: insert into goal (userID, goalNum, goal, startDate, endDate) values (#{userID}, #{goalNum}, #{goal}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goal WHERE userID=#{userID} ORDER BY startDate DESC limit 1

SELECT (count(if(A.regdate >= B.startdate and A.regdate <= B.enddate, A.userID, null))/B.goalNum)*100 AS rate, B.id AS id, B.goalNum AS goalNum, B.goal AS goal, B.startdate as startDate, B.enddate as endDate FROM goal as B LEFT OUTER JOIN userProblem as A ON B.userID = A.userID WHERE B.userID=#{userID} GROUP BY B.startdate, B.enddate ORDER BY B.startdate DESC;

mapper.update: UPDATE goal SET goal='${goal}', startDate='${startDate}', endDate='${endDate}', goalNum='${goalNum}' WHERE id = #{id}
